--- rename_table_multiple.sql
RENAME TABLE Singers TO Artists, Albums TO Recordings
--- AST
&ast.RenameTable{
  Rename:   0,
  SrcDests: []*ast.RenameTableSrcDest{
    &ast.RenameTableSrcDest{
      Src: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 20,
        Name:    "Singers",
      },
      Dest: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 31,
        Name:    "Artists",
      },
    },
    &ast.RenameTableSrcDest{
      Src: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 33,
        NameEnd: 39,
        Name:    "Albums",
      },
      Dest: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 43,
        NameEnd: 53,
        Name:    "Recordings",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
RENAME TABLE Singers TO Artists, Albums TO Recordings
